title: Pope apologizes for 'catastrophic' school abuses in Canada
content:
1. Pope apologizes for 'catastrophic' school abuses in Canada  The Associated Press - en Español
  2. Pope arrives in Canada for 'trip of penance'  Reuters
  3. Pope apologizes for 'evil committed by so many Christians' in Canada's residential schools  The Washington Post
  4. Pope apologizes for 'deplorable evil' of Indigenous abuse in Canadian Catholic residential schools  CNN
  5. Pope Francis To Apologize To Indigenous Community On 'Trip Of Penance' To Canada  NBC News
